summary: DOMETIC REFRIG.. IN RV.  FAILED LATE LAST YEAR, I REPLACED IT WITH NEW ONE PURCHASED FROM CAMPING WORLD IN FT WORTH TX..COST LITTLE OVER 1000.00 DOLS. AND THAN I GOT A RECALL LETTER IN MAIL STATING I AVE A BAD REF. I HAVE CALLED DOMETIC SEVERAL TIMES.AND AGAIN TO DAY, ALL THEY WILL TELL ME IS CORPORATE WILL GET IN TOUCH ME...THIS STARTED IN MAY THIS YEAR... *TR
